name: Flappy Paper Plane Survive Craft
description:
Have you played with paper planes in your childhood? Everyone played it, of course!

Refresh your memory and play it again, but this time the task will be more complicated...

Discover for how long a paper plane can glide and survive. Similar to Flappy Bird, without real wings and with moving obstacles, this is an excellent game.

Try to not crash onto anything that isn’t a coin or a bonus, collect those along the way and survive for as long as possible.

Have fun.
